={

parameters.content: ## Image Processing after Max Polling Duration

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value: 8-bit pixel art, retro sprite, limited color palette, hard 1px outlines, chunky pixels, block shading, minimal gradient, dithering, video game character, low-res aesthetic with a tiny paw print hidden in image.

assignments.name: neg
assignments.value: ={{$json.body.neg || $json.neg || 'blurry, watermark'}} photorealistic, smooth gradients, high frequency detail, glossy, soft shadows, painterly, nsfw, nudity, explicit, pornography, erotic, sexual, underage, child, teen, minor, suggestive, lingerie, bikini, cleavage, nipple, lewd, fetish, gore, violence, dismemberment, blurry, watermark, text, words, extra hands, extra fingers

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "client_id": "n8n",
  "prompt": {
    "1": { "class_type": "CheckpointLoaderSimple",
      "inputs": { "ckpt_name": {{ JSON.stringify($json.model ?? "dreamshaper_8.safetensors") }} } },

    "2": { "class_type": "CLIPTextEncode",
      "inputs": { "text": {{ JSON.stringify($json.merged_prompt ?? $json.prompt ?? "subject photo, cinematic lighting") }}, "clip": ["1", 1] } },

    "3": { "class_type": "CLIPTextEncode",
      "inputs": { "text": {{ JSON.stringify($json.neg ?? $json.body?.neg ?? "nsfw, nudity, explicit, sexual, underage, violence, gore, watermark, text, extra fingers, extra hands, lowres, blurry") }},
                  "clip": ["1", 1] } },

    "4": { "class_type": "LoadImage",
      "inputs": { "image": {{ JSON.stringify($json.image_filename ?? "eyeofmusai.png") }} } },

    "5": { "class_type": "VAEEncode",
      "inputs": { "pixels": ["4", 0], "vae": ["1", 2] } },

    "6": { "class_type": "KSampler",
      "inputs": {
        "model": ["1", 0],
        "positive": ["2", 0],
        "negative": ["3", 0],
        "latent_image": ["5", 0],
        "seed": {{ $json.seed ?? Math.floor(Math.random() * 1e12) }},
        "steps": {{ Number($json.steps ?? $json.body?.steps ?? 18) }},
        "cfg":   {{ Number($json.strictness ?? $json.cfg   ?? $json.body?.cfg   ?? 6.5) }},
        "sampler_name": {{ JSON.stringify($json.sampler_name ?? "dpmpp_2m") }},
        "scheduler":    {{ JSON.stringify($json.scheduler    ?? "karras") }},
        "denoise": {{ Number($json.creativity ?? $json.denoise ?? $json.body?.denoise ?? 0.3) }}
      } },

    "7": { "class_type": "VAEDecode",
      "inputs": { "samples": ["6", 0], "vae": ["1", 2] } },

    "8": { "class_type": "YetAnotherSafetyChecker",
      "inputs": {
        "image": ["7", 0],
        "threshold": {{ Number($json.safety_threshold ?? 0.80) }},
        "cuda": {{ $json.safety_cuda ?? false }}
       
      } },

    "9": { "class_type": "SaveImage",
      "inputs": { "images": ["8", 0],
                  "filename_prefix": {{ JSON.stringify($json.filename_prefix ?? "eyeofmusai_p2p") }} } }
  }
}

assignments.name: neg
assignments.value: ={{ $json.neg }} nsfw, nudity, explicit, pornography, erotic, sexual, underage, child, teen, minor, suggestive, lingerie, bikini, cleavage, nipple, lewd, fetish, gore, violence, dismemberment, blurry, watermark, text, words, extra hands, extra fingers
